function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emergence of epidemic diseases impacting sustainable development","Impact":"Negative impact on economy, social problems, and sustainable development","Mitigation":"Developing robust health systems, investing in medical research, and implementing preventive measures","Technologies":"Telemedicine, contact tracing apps, and remote health monitoring","People":"General population, government authorities, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government authorities, healthcare organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"COVID-19 impacting the construction industry","Impact":"Delays, disruption, and temporary halts in construction projects","Mitigation":"Implementing health and safety protocols, maintaining supply chains, and adapting project timelines","Technologies":"Remote project management tools, virtual collaboration platforms, and health monitoring devices","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and government agencies","Owner":"Construction companies, government agencies, and project stakeholders"}]}
